spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The githyanki's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The githyanki is an 8th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). The githyanki has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: War Magic
entries: When the githyanki uses its action to cast a spell, it can make one weapon attack as a bonus action.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The githyanki makes two longsword attacks.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage plus 18 ({@damage 4d8}) psychic damage, or 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) slashing damage plus 18 ({@damage 4d8}) psychic damage if used with two hands.
